meanings.definition: A type of military haircut in which the hair is cut short and flat on top.
meanings.sent1: The soldier's flattops made them look very neat and disciplined.
meanings.sent2: I asked the barber for a flattops haircut before joining the army.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that his flattops made him aerodynamic in a windstorm.
meanings.sent4: Her flattops were like a perfectly trimmed hedge on her head.
meanings.sent5: The image of his flattops stayed in my mind long after I left the barbershop.

meanings.sent2: The naval fleet included several flattops for air operations.
meanings.sent3: The pirates marveled at the vastness of the flattops they encountered.
meanings.sent4: The flattops of the warship resembled a floating runway in the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The sailors gathered on the flattops to watch the sunset over the horizon.
